des: "Delicious medley of fresh fruit and vegetables! All the colors of the rainbow come together to create a wonderful and refreshing taste. Homemade dressing makes it perfect."
ins: Place the tomato, mango, avocado, bell pepper, blueberries, onion, and cilantro into a large bowl. Pour the lime juice and pineapple juice overtop. Stir gently until evenly combined. Serve immediately for the freshest taste.
